channel.title: PI base Server starting- need reliable co-owner/secondary coder
channel.description:
Hey! I'm starting a server, and I can follow a tutorial, and customize a server, but I'd like to have a secondary person on the server when I'm not around. Coding experience will definitely give you an edge over others. This position would include co-owner status, and you would have to be responsible, reliable, trustworthy, friendly, and mature. I'd also prefer that you be over 16 years of age, but I'll take it on a case by case basis. You'll also need a Skype, and legible typing skills, with decent grammar and spelling.
Reply here, and if I like what I read, I'll send you a Skype username and we can get started.
Thanks! -Kleber
